title: Question about tickets
body: Sent in a ticket yesterday no response yet, about how long does it take to get a response?

replies.body:
It really depends on what kind of ticket it is and how many tickets we've had submitted recently. It shouldn't be long before a specialist reaches back out, but we approach tickets on a first-come-first-served basis, so give it a bit more time, friend. :)

If you have any other questions, hit me back.
